mapper.sql: id, advertise_id, trade_id, operation_type, inet_ntoa(source_ip) as source_ip, FROM_UNIXTIME(gmt_create) as gmt_create, gmt_modified
mapper.select:
select
from report_info where gmt_create < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{gmtCreate}) limit #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into report_info(source_ip, operation_type, advertise_id, trade_id, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values(inet_aton(#{ip}), #{operationType}, #{advertiseId}, #{tradeId}, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(now()), now())
